item.crawling-mysteries.cryptic_eye.tool: A cryptic eye that seems to be following you.
item.crawling-mysteries.eternal_guardian: A mystical ring forged in the heart of ancient enchantments.
When your last breath escapes, the Eternal Guardian's Band swiftly conjures a solemn tombstone, cradling your belongings in its protective embrace.
Your items shall await your triumphant return.

item.crawling-mysteries.eternal_guardian.text: This item is disabled in the config

advancement.crawling-mysteries.desc: You awoke with this strange eye watching you, where does it come from ?
advancement.crawling-mysteries.eternal_g: Unearth the secrets of the ancients and find the Eternal Guardian's Band hidden within the depths of a forsaken dungeon. Secure your destiny as the one who commands the protection of the afterlife.
text.config.crawling-mysteries.title: Crawling Mysteries
